alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:37PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG DOWNSLOPE WINDS POSSIBLE THIS EVENING INTO TONIGHT... Strong westerly winds with gusts as high as 55 mph may develop tonight into tomorrow morning over portions of the central and southern Black Hills through the southeastern and southern foothills. The most likely locations for these enhanced winds will be from near Hill City southward to Hot Springs at elevations of 3500 to 5500 feet, with the strongest gusts expected to occur within Custer State Park and Wind Cave National Park. More widespread windy conditions are expected beginning mid- morning as a cold front crosses the area from northwest to southeast.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
